categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A member of the Jedi Order participated in the Clone Wars, fighting for the Galactic Republic against the Confederacy of Independent Systems between 22 BBY and 19 BBY. The Jedi, serving as a general for the Republic, was vaporized by Separatist fire during the Battle of Altyr V. Nevertheless, the clone trooper captain CT-65/91-6210 took command of the Republic troops and managed to secure the Outer Rim Territories planet Altyr V for the Republic.

The Jedi general was mentioned in "Guide to the Grand Army of the Republic," an article written by Karen Traviss and Ryan Kaufman. The guide was published in Star Wars Insider 84, which was released on September 13, 2005.
